local_intent: Align to the T-block, set yaw, execute the main 0.2 m push, and confirm continued visibility.
assumptions: Light contact is acceptable after alignment without explicit contact-check step.
Target zone approach and corrective push will occur in subsequent steps.
coherence_with_global: Implements the primary push phase: detects the block with retry, aligns, sets yaw=90, pushes distance=0.2 in direction 0, then verifies visibility. Matches the global BT parameters and the stepwise planâ€™s main push.
